rules_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control ten or more storied permanents, you win the game. [i](Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“The world fractured around him as he arose into the light and seized his destiny.”
—Azamir, “The Test Of Sunlight”[/i]
